mapper.select: select * from message where conversation_id = #{conversationId} and id < #{maxMessageId} order by id desc limit 20
mapper.insert: insert into message (id, conversation_id, sender_id, receiver_id, content, msg_type, file_id, file_name, bucket, remote_path, file_size, preview_base64, local_path, remote_url) values (#{id}, #{conversationId}, #{senderId}, #{receiverId}, #{content}, #{msgType}, #{fileId}, #{fileName}, #{bucket}, #{remotePath}, #{fileSize}, #{previewBase64}, #{localPath}, #{remoteUrl})
mapper.select: select * from message where conversation_id = #{conversationId} order by send_time
